entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned in the context of revenging himself upon his father.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who is having a conversation with someone else about Morfin's confession and memory.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: The uncle of Harry Potter, who confessed to the crime but had a real memory in him all the time.

relationships.description: Dumbledore visited Morfin in the last weeks of his life.
Dumbledore extracted a memory from Morfin with difficulty.
